name: Ultimate Card Fighter VS Zombies
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 41, in 72h. The theme was Combine 2 Incompatible Genres.

We decided to combine card games with a beat’em up, resulting in Ultimate Card Fighter VS Zombies.

You are a geek in a city filled with monsters, use your magic cards to wipe ‘em all !

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys : Move the character
  • Spacebar : Validate your move, if you don’t want to use a card
  • Mouse : Chose and use a card

You can share what you think here : Ludum Dare Page
